TextView.android:text: 1. Status of Earthing, Lightning and Surge Protection Devices (SPD)
Status of Lightening and Surge Protection:
Earth resistance of lightning Protection System (In Ohms)
Earth resistance of Surge Protection System (In Ohms) Both at Equipment Site and Equipment room Site (ATS Building)
Status of SPD (Power & Data) at Equipment site
Status of SPD (Data) at Equipment room site (In ATS Building]
2. System Operation on Battery Back-up (Voltage Check at RMM)
Operation on batteries for 10 minutes Approx.
*Nominal value as measured during commissioning/initial measurement (value within limits)
